page.title: 07Leisure in Woodham Ferrers 4
page.content: Snooker is popular with all ages at home and in the Village Hall. Also a very popular TV sport. Football is mainly enjoyed by the young and is less popular recently as a spectator sport because of the increase in hooliganism. Jogging and marathons are enjoyed by spectators and all ages in 'fun runs'. Denser house building has resulted in smaller gardens but off estates gardens are larger. Greenhouses provide tomatoes and cucumbers. Children enjoy small plots of their own. Houseplants can be found in every home. Common vegetables grown; runner beans, lettuces, carrots, radishes, brussel sprouts, cauliflowers, potatoes, onions and cabbages. Traditional games such as chess, draughts, ludon and Monopoly still seem more popular than the newer computer games.
